amendatorysection.catchline: Public buildings; works of art; Nebraska Arts Council; maintain inventory; inspect; recommend procedures.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Arts Council shall maintain an inventory of all works of art purchased under sections 82-317 to 82-329, 85-106 to 85-106.03, and 85-304 to 85-304.03 and shall inspect each work of art on a regular schedule to determine its condition. The Nebraska Arts Council may recommend procedures for regular maintenance, preservation, and security and for the repair of any damaged work of art.
